00010 #include "Coordinates.h"
00011 #include "Filter2D.h"
00012 
00013 namespace tpk {
00014 
00016 
00022    class PiFilter2D : public Filter2D {
00023       protected:
00024          double Pgain;
00025          double Igain;
00026          double Window2;
00027          double Saturate;
00028          xycoord Integrator;
00029       public:
00030          PiFilter2D(
00031             const double pgain,     
00032             const double igain,     
00033             const double window,    
00034             const double saturate   
00035          ) : Pgain(pgain),
00036              Igain(igain),
00037              Window2(window * window),
00038              Saturate(saturate),
00039              Integrator(0.0, 0.0) {};
00040          PiFilter2D(
00041             const PiFilter2D& src
00042          ) : Filter2D(src) {
00043             src.Mutex.lock();
00044             Pgain = src.Pgain;
00045             Igain = src.Igain;
00046             Window2 = src.Window2;
00047             Saturate = src.Saturate;
00048             Integrator = src.Integrator;
00049             src.Mutex.unlock();
00050          }
00051 
00053          PiFilter2D(
00054             const double pgain      
00055          ) : Pgain(pgain),
00056              Igain(0.0),
00057              Window2(0.0),
00058              Saturate(0.0),
00059              Integrator(0.0, 0.0) {};
00060 
00062          virtual PiFilter2D* clone() const {
00063             return new PiFilter2D(*this);
00064          };
00065 
00067          virtual xycoord operator<<(
00068             const xycoord& input
00069          );
00070 
00072          virtual void reset( 
00073             const xycoord& xy     
00074          ) {
00075             Mutex.lock();
00076             Value = xy;
00077             Integrator = xycoord(0.0, 0.0);
00078             Mutex.unlock();
00079          };
00080 
00082          virtual void tune(
00083             const double pgain,     
00084             const double igain,     
00085             const double window,    
00086             const double saturate   
00087          ) {
00088             Mutex.lock();
00089             Pgain = pgain;
00090             Igain = igain;
00091             Window2 = window * window;
00092             Saturate = saturate;
00093             Mutex.unlock();
00094          };
00095 
00096        private:
00097    // There is no default constructor.
00098          PiFilter2D(); 
00099    };
00100 }
00101 #endif
